> [shellbound](#comment_17_1H1SHzxnPJS3hBbKvfXLqf4QJnXEUgaVe9): Yes, I have an egalitarian leaning but rather think of a mixed economy than a pure socialist or capitalist one.

I think you have fallen prey to thinking of socialism as state ownership or intervention.
Socialism is the democratic control over the means of production.
Socialism and Capitalism cannot coexist.

2_17LQPJZz9sBC1besM5ZwKFKt9CmndJTjcA.body: This is the sort of shit which makes people steer away from decentralized and uncensorable networking.
